00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_SPECTRUM_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_SPECTRUM_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace Result {
00035   class SpectrumPeak : public Base {
00036   public:
00037     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPeak> sptr;
00038     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPeak> Handle;
00039     typedef frequency_vector<double> PowerSpectrum;
00040     SpectrumPeak(ptime time, double fReference)
00041       : Base("SpectrumPeak", time)
00042       , fReference_(fReference) 
00043       , fMeasured_(0.) 
00044       , fMeasuredRMS_(1.) 
00045       , strength_(0.) 
00046       , strengthRMS_(1.)
00047       , ratio_(1.) {}
00048 
00049     bool findPeak(const Proxy::Base& p,
00050                   const SpectrumBase& s,
00051                   const PowerSpectrum& ps,
00052                   double minRatio) {
00053       return ps.empty() ? false : findPeak(p, s, ps, ps.front().first, ps.back().first, minRatio);
00054     }
00055     // find a peak in the range [fMin, fMax] (including fMax)
00056     bool findPeak(const Proxy::Base& p,
00057                   const SpectrumBase& s,
00058                   const PowerSpectrum& ps,
00059                   double fMin, double fMax,
00060                   double minRatio) {
00061       const size_t i0(ps.freq2index(fMin));
00062       const size_t i1(ps.freq2index(fMax));
00063 
00064       PowerSpectrum::const_iterator
00065         iMax(std::max_element(ps.begin()+i0, ps.begin()+i1+1,
00066                               PowerSpectrum::cmpSecond));
00067       
00068       const size_t indexMax(std::distance(ps.begin(), iMax));
00069 
00070       // estimate frequency 
00071       const std::pair<double, double> 
00072         peakFrequency(estimatePeakFrequency(ps, indexMax));
00073 
00074       // estimate background
00075       const std::pair<double, double> 
00076         background(estimateBackground(ps, indexMax, i0, i1));
00077       
00078       ratio_ = (background.first != 0.0) ? iMax->second / background.first : 1.0;
00079       if (ratio_ < minRatio)
00080         LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("SpectrumPeak: ratio < minRatio, ratio=%f bkgd=(%f,%f) fRef=%12.3f") 
00081                         % ratio_
00082                         % background.first
00083                         % background.second
00084                         % fReference()));
00085 
00086       // TODO: error propagation
00087       fMeasured_    = peakFrequency.first;
00088       fMeasuredRMS_ = peakFrequency.second;
00089       strength_     = p.volt2dbm((ratio_ > minRatio) ? iMax->second : background.first);
00090       strengthRMS_  = p.rms_dbm();
00091       return (ratio_ > minRatio);
00092     }
00093 
00094     std::pair<double, double> 
00095     estimatePeakFrequency(const PowerSpectrum& ps, size_t indexMax) const {
00096       double sum(0.0);
00097       double weight(0.0);
00098       for (size_t u(indexMax-std::min(indexMax, size_t(3))); 
00099            u<(indexMax+4) && u < ps.size(); ++u) {
00100         sum    += ps[u].second * ps[u].first;
00101         weight += ps[u].second;
00102       }
00103       return (weight != 0.0) ? cal(sum/weight) : std::make_pair(0.0, 1.0);
00104     }
00105 
00106     std::pair<double, double> 
00107     estimateBackground(const PowerSpectrum& ps, size_t indexMax,
00108                        size_t i0, size_t i1) const {
00109       double sum(0.0), sum2(0.0);
00110       size_t counter(0);
00111       for (size_t u(i0); u<i1+1; ++u) {
00112         if (std::abs(int(u) - int(indexMax)) < 4) continue;
00113         sum += ps[u].second;
00114         sum2 += ps[u].second * ps[u].second;
00115         ++counter;
00116       }      
00117       return (counter != 0) 
00118         ? std::make_pair(sum/counter, 
00119                          std::sqrt(sum2/counter - sum*sum/(counter*counter)))
00120         : std::make_pair(0., 1.);
00121     }
00122 
00123     virtual ~SpectrumPeak() {}
00124     virtual std::string toString() const { 
00125       std::stringstream ss; 
00126       ss << Base::toString() 
00127          << " fReference="   << fReference()
00128          << " fMeasured="    << fMeasured()
00129          << " fMeasuredRMS=" << fMeasuredRMS()
00130          << " strength="     << strength()
00131          << " strengthRMS="  << strengthRMS()
00132          << " ratio="        << ratio();
00133       return ss.str();
00134     }
00135     double fReference() const { return fReference_; }
00136     double fMeasured() const { return fMeasured_; }
00137     double fMeasuredRMS() const { return fMeasuredRMS_; }
00138     double strength() const { return strength_; }
00139     double strengthRMS() const { return strengthRMS_; }
00140     double ratio() const { return ratio_; }
00141 
00142     // this method is overwritten e.g. in CalibratedSpectrumPeak
00143     virtual std::pair<double, double> cal(double f) const {
00144       return std::make_pair(f, double(1));
00145     }
00146 
00147     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {
00148       os << "# Frequency = " << boost::format("%12.3f") % fReference() << " [Hz]\n";
00149       Base::dump_header(os);
00150       return os << "fMeasured_Hz fMeasuredRMS_Hz strength_dBm strengthRMS_dBm S/N_dB ";
00151     }
00152     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00153       return os << boost::format("%12.3f") % fMeasured() << " "
00154                 << boost::format("%6.3f")  % fMeasuredRMS() << " "
00155                 << boost::format("%7.2f")  % strength() << " "
00156                 << boost::format("%7.2f")  % strengthRMS() << " "
00157                 << boost::format("%7.2f")  % (20.*std::log10(ratio())) << " ";
00158     }
00159 
00160   private:
00161     double fReference_;   // [Hz]
00162     double fMeasured_;    // [Hz]
00163     double fMeasuredRMS_; // [Hz]
00164     double strength_;     // [dBm]
00165     double strengthRMS_;  // [dBm]
00166     double ratio_;        // [1]
00167   } ;
00168 } // namespace Result
00169
